tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE microbiome_samples (
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    bacteria_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    abundance DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    sample_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE microbiome_predictions (
    prediction_id INT NOT NULL,
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    bacteria_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    predicted_abundance DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    prediction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (prediction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES microbiome_samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE microbiome_samples (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
barcode VARCHAR(255),
sequence VARCHAR(255),
species VARCHAR(255),
date_collected DATE);

CREATE TABLE microbiome_composition (composition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
sample_id INT,
species VARCHAR(255),
abundance FLOAT,
FOREIGN KEY(sample_id) REFERENCES microbiome_samples(sample_id));

CREATE TABLE microbiome_metadata (metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
sample_id INT,
genotype VARCHAR(255),
phenotype VARCHAR(255),
FOREIGN KEY(sample_id) REFERENCES microbiome_samples(sample_id));

CREATE TABLE microbiome_predictions (prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
sample_id INT,
model VARCHAR(255),
predicted_species VARCHAR(255),
prediction_date DATE,
FOREIGN KEY(sample_id) REFERENCES microbiome_samples(sample_id));

CREATE TABLE microbiome_samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date_collected DATE,
  bacteria_species VARCHAR(255),
  abundance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_metadata (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE microbiome_taxonomy (
  bacteria_species VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
  phylum VARCHAR(50),
  class VARCHAR(50),
  order_name VARCHAR(50),
  family VARCHAR(50),
  genus VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_factors (
  factor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  factor_name VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE microbiome_predictions (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  prediction_date DATE,
  predicted_species VARCHAR(255),
  confidence_level FLOAT
)
